Truth Initiative | Washington, DC | Full Time, Onsite | Senior Software Developer

We're a Python shop, creating smoking cessation apps for a research institute inside of Truth Initiative, the people behind the truthÂ® anti-smoking campaign. Most of our work provides the technological muscle behind various research grants, with an emphasis on online social networks, text messaging, and mobile applications.

Basically, we write apps that help people quit smoking...FOR SCIENCE!

We're a small time that uses Python, Django, MySQL (sorry), Phonegap/Cordova, Sencha Touch, Heroku, and other neat things to build web and mobile apps. We're in Chinatown directly across from the metro, with a crazy awesome benefits package and competitive salary. I personally think this is one of the best Python jobs here in DC, but you should apply and come talk to us to find out yourself.

You can apply here: https://truthinitiative.applicantpool.com/jobs/51033.html
